headline: Malaysia Achieves Enterprise-Level L4 Autonomous Logistics Vehicle Milestone
reason: This article details a significant L4 autonomous driving milestone achieved in Malaysia with the first enterprise-level L4 autonomous logistics vehicle project by 9D Technology and ALS. It highlights the integration of high-precision maps, multi-sensor fusion, and real-time decision-making algorithms, marking a practical deployment in complex logistics scenarios and paving the way for future commercial applications.
